page.title: 01CRAWLEY: A GAZETTEER
page.content: This block is the western and central parts of{Crawley.}Only a small area of fields in the NW is not urban. The Central Business District is in the east surrounded by older parts of{West {Green}and{Southgate.}Named residential neighbourhoods are{Northgate, Tilgate, {Gossops Green, Ifield}(former village whose church and Green remain) and, most recently,{Bewbush,}under construction. Areas of interest are {Ifield Millpond, Goff's Park, The {Hawth, Ewhurst Wood and Memorial {Gardens.}Facilities for a town of 80000 people are extensive with a cinema, small theatre, technical college, large hospital, major lending library, Borough Council offices and services, swimming pool, two leisure centres, Area Education Office, and a huge variety of sports, recreation and other clubs and several newspapers.
